src:
英語民間試験の実施見送りは「若者に迷惑かけた」…安住氏、責任追及へ

01 Nov 2019, 05:14

　自民党の森山裕国会対策委員長は１日午前、立憲民主党の安住淳国対委員長らと国会内で会談し、河井克行・前法相の辞任を受けて混乱した国会を正常化させることで合意した。安倍首相が出席し、衆院は６日、参院は８日に予算委員会の集中審議を行う。
　１日は、政府・与党が今国会の最重要議案と位置づける日米貿易協定の承認案が衆院外務委員会で実質審議入りする予定だった。野党側の要求に応じ、この日の委員会は取りやめる方向となった。
　一方、萩生田文部科学相が大学入学共通テストでの英語民間試験の活用について、２０２０年度からの実施の見送りを発表したことに関し、安住氏は国会内で記者団に「多くの若者に迷惑をかけた。直前でブレーキをかけたが、その影響は計り知れない」と述べ、萩生田氏らの責任を徹底追及する考えを示した。
text:
The postponement of the private English exam was "disturbed to the youth" ... Mr. Yasuzumi, to pursue responsibility

01 Nov 2019, 05:14

Liberal Democratic Party chairman Hiroyama Moriyama met on the morning of the Constitutional Democratic Party's chairman, Kuniyuki Azumi, and agreed to normalize the confused parliament following the resignation of Katsuyuki Kawai and the former Minister of Justice. . Prime Minister Abe attends, and the House of Representatives conducts intensive deliberations on the budget committee on the 6th and the House of Councilors on the 8th.
On the 1st, the proposal for approval of the US-Japan Trade Agreement, which the government and the ruling party positioned as the most important agenda of the current Diet, was scheduled to be substantively deliberated at the House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee. In response to a request from the opposition party, the day's committee was canceled.
On the other hand, Mr. Yasumi told reporters in the Diet about the inconvenience of many young people about the fact that the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology announced the postponement of the implementation of the private English examination in the university entrance examination. "I applied the brakes just before, but the effects are immeasurable," he said.
